name: shov-js
description: JavaScript SDK for Shov - AI-native database with vector search and real-time streaming

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --packages=external --outfile=dist/index.js && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --format=esm --packages=external --outfile=dist/index.mjs && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist

author: Shov
